entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistency when combining `file:` URIs #85229
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"SSA check failures"' during 'Redundant branch opts' #85226
  • JIT: Invalid result with negated op in compare on arm64 #85225
  • Unable to get exception's filename and line number in mono. #85223
  • [API Proposal]: CRC-32C non-cryptographic hashing API #85222
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\bigevent\\bigevent\\bigevent.cmd #85213
  • Test failure Interop/NativeLibrary/API/NativeLibraryTests/NativeLibraryTests.sh #85212
  • Test failure System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.FileStreamFlushAsyncThreadPoolDeadlockTest #85211
  • Inliner: don't give up on virtual calls if we can clarify their exact targets after inlining #85209
    Future
  • Force AOT tooling to preserve a generic type to avoid MakeGenericType fails for scripting libraries. #85208
  • Finish Avx512 specific lightup for Vector128/256/512<T> #85207
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Encoding.TryGetBytes/Chars #84425
    8.0.0
  • Nested struct array throws TypeLoadException at runtime when type of nested struct array is defined with generics #85134
  • Dynamic block nodes should not generate non-null assertions #62328
    Future
  • Duplicated loop body #52586
    Future
  • Extra copy of struct before return #38743
    Future
  • JsonException is too general #610
    Future
  • PhysicalAddress.Parse should support more formats #26188
    Future
  • Implement public partial sort Array API #24468
    Future
  • Implement `Vector512<T>` API surface for `Vector512` hardware acceleration #80814
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Expose AVX512 variants of AVX, AVX2, and FMA instructions #85228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #85227
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Move some BasicBlock methods into block.cpp #85224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize the CRC64 implementation #85221
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Set .env variables in corerun prior to CLR init #85220
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] fix the genCodeForJumpCompare for reverse. #85217
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] fix compiling errors for `ins_Move_Extend`. #85216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Change default CFB feedback size for DES.Create() #85214
    area-System.Security

Merged

  • Fix source-index-stage1 official build #85215
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [mono] fix two call get_default_jit_mm make hotreload work in non default alc #84247
    area-EnC-mono, community-contribution
  • Add public Encoding.TryGetBytes/Chars #85120
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Set `GTF_GLOB_REF` in `gtNewIndir` #85204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Report -1 for GC.GetGeneration(nongc_obj) and same for GetObjectGeneration #85017
    breaking-change, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add a test for `STORE_DYN_BLK(..., IND(null), ...)` #85103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable `StripSymbols` by default #85139
    breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix typo #85210
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Improve ProbabilisticMap performance for small value sets #85202
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Support non core types for signature and other type references #85112
    area-System.Reflection.Emit

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fold IND(frozenObj, CNS) #85127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Split assignment rationalization into a separate phase #85180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Transform indirect calls to direct ones in the importer #85197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2/r2rdump for LA64. #85038
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, partner-impact
  • [wasi] implement ICU bundling #85049
    area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Fix XUnit Log Fixer Irregularities #85183
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Disable gcstress and jitstress for tracing tests #85186
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo14::EnumerateNonGCObjects #85100
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Adding TimeProvider CreateCancellationTokenSource extension method #85131
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support some assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add metadata update for overrides #85182
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Vectorize IEnumerable<T>.Sum where possible #84519
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Special-case enums in Utf8.TryWrite handler #85196
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] fix the errors for mod/div after #82924. #85140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests timeouts #85167
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Don't re-scan previously visited blocks in helperexpansion.cpp #85201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
